question: you have decided to leave your currer job and look for a new one .Write a letter to a friend . In your letter explainWhy you want to leave your current jobdescribe what kind of job you are looking forask for some help or advice
text: I hope you are doing well, I am writing this letter to let you know that I decided to apply for a new occupation. you already know that I recently get my master's degree in psychology so after a long reflection I choose to be a psychological therapist instead of being a nurse for the rest of my life.

As I mentioned in the previous email, being a nurse at the radiotherapy department has become more and more stressful, especially on the night shift. Moreover, my schedule is full all the time so I couldn't do enough activities with my children and my husband on the weekends.

For that, I want to apply for a loan for opening a health center, but before that, I need your help to choose a convenient location where I could open this clinic, also you are an interior designer accordingly, you will decorate the center mainly my office.
Finally, I am waiting to hear from you.
